basics.name: Pavel Gasanov
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Pavel is a web engineer and senior full-stack developer with a master's degree in computer science. He specializes in working with AI startups, bringing extensive experience across projects of all sizes - from small prototypes to large-scale online intranets, data processing platforms, and content management systems. Pavel is a passionate programmer who thrives in collaborative environments, consistently finding common ground among team members to deliver optimal solutions to complex problems.
